name: The Crawl (PopleZoo)
description:
Controls

W / Up Arrow to move, A and D / Left Arrow and Right Arrow to turn left Or right .

Move mouse to look around the screen, Left Click to shoot / swing.

Scroll to change between weapons.

Aim

The aim? Collect all 6 Keys Scattered around the dungeon. Collect them all to escape!!!

Art

The Enemies are created by dokozai. However the animations to said sprites I did myself.

Music

All music came from https://opengameart.org/. 

Main-Menu Music: https://opengameart.org/content/dark-theme

In Game Music: https://opengameart.org/content/magical-theme

SFX

All Sound effects where found at https://freesound.org/, (Sorry can't remember the actual names of them...)
